message: Let's split fairly, Bob. I take 60 and you take 40. This is a good deal for you right now considering the inflation!
I'll take 55 and you can have 45. We both get a little more, and we avoid the inflation!
Bob, this is your last chance for a decent deal. The longer this goes on, the less your share will be worth. Take the 35!
Alice, we're both losing out with each round. Let's split 60/40 again. I'm willing to take less now to end this.
